english.segment1: These thousand hills roll ever on. In footprints of a Mighty God. They bring me to my knees in praise. Amazing love, amazing grace
english.segment2: Was on a hill my Savior died. A broken heart, a bleeding side. Hill of the skull, Mount Calvary. The blood He shed, He shed for me
english.segment3: When heaven's hills at last I roam. Forever settle in my home. I'll join the saints around Your throne. Your kingdom, Lord, rolls ever on
english.segment4: These thousand hills roll ever on. Ripples of a coming storm. The morning star precedes the dawn. These thousand hills roll ever on
